meanings.definition: The action or process of duplicating something.
meanings.sent1: The duplication of the document was completed quickly.
meanings.sent2: She made a duplication of the key for her friend.
meanings.sent3: The duplication of his dance moves was so accurate, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The duplication of her artwork was like looking at two identical twins.
meanings.sent5: The duplication of the recipe made it easy for everyone to follow.

meanings.definition: An exact copy or replica of something.
meanings.sent1: The duplication of the painting was hanging in the museum.
meanings.sent2: He requested a duplication of the important file for backup.
meanings.sent3: The duplication of the famous painting was so perfect, it fooled many art experts.
meanings.sent4: The duplication of the ancient artifact was so precise, it seemed like the original.
meanings.sent5: The duplication of the song made it sound like a professional recording.
